column4: hello guys, i am looking to do some basic programing in linux, or something a lot like basic. it doesn't have to be graphical, i basically use it to do simple mathmatics, but i do need to compile it so i can take it to another pc.
sorry for off topic, but is python as simple as basic is? because i can always run quickbasic in dosbox...
python isn't bad; it's pretty simple if you start with the easy stuff
I think python probably is as long as you only learn a bit of it
